channel.title: IDEAJ on DDQ的笔记
channel.description: Recent content in IDEAJ on DDQ的笔记

item.title: IDEAJ下配置Maven
item.description: 打开设置 Settings > Build, Execution, Deployment > Build Tools > Maven 修改 Maven 路径和本地仓库的路径 修改 Maven 目录： 修改 Maven 配置文件路径 修改 Maven 本地仓库路径 Settings > Build, Execution, Deployment > Build Tools > Maven > Importing Maven 自动导包设置
